casebody.data:
Wednesday, March 31, 1993

MOTION DOCKET

91-2010. Turner v. Turner.

Lorain County, No. 91CA004961. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Lorain County. Upon consideration of appellant’s request to postpone oral argument currently scheduled for April 28, 1993,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that said request be, and the same is hereby, denied.
